name: Visual Tool Markup Language File
summary: Learn about .VTML files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: VTML files are used by applications such as Adobe Dreamweaver. They are also used by older applications such as Adobe ColdFusion Studio, Macromedia HomeSite, and JRun Studio.
NOTE: VTML files more commonly use the .VTM extension.

description: File created in the Visual Took Markup Language (VTML) format; allows developers to extend an application user interface with new language tags; often used for defining code hinting, code completion, and tag formatting functions.
